description: Doesn't work at all

brilliant edit
editor

The single star rating is for the snap not the application itself which I didn't test. Read on.

The app fails to start and issues the follwing error when launched from the commandline:

This application failed to start because it could not find or load the Qt platform plugin "wayland-egl"

A quick research on the internet found as the only solution to launch it with:

DISABLE_WAYLAND=1 notepadqq

If this is really the only option to fix the problem it should be included when installing the snap. So it looks like the snap version of notepadqq is not very well maintained. :-(
It can not find the installed printer.
This Snap does not include GLIBC which causes the app to crash.
Just doesn't work. I could probably diagnose in the terminal, but I don't want to. It should work, or it shouldn't be in the app store. Don't bother with it.
Why is this garbage listed when it doesn't work on a fresh LTS install?
This app could view the files and folders in the /media directory. Useless!
installed no errors, tried to open but get nothing. reinstall and same issue.
Installed, but it won't launch.  Uninstalled
See summary. Unacceptable.
bbbbbbbcvbvcbvcbvcbcv
snap application does not launch on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS. Use sudo apt install notepadqq to install instead.
it works like notepad ++
It Is Not Opening After Completion OF Installation.

love the feature similar to Notepad++ where you don't need to save a document and keep information on several tabs without the need of saving it. But i keep getting the same error message "Notepadqq was not closed properly. Do you want to recover unsaved changes?"

i need solution please

The app "works", the problem is it doesn't recognize the owner of the files or the permissions given to them. If I want to mod a file in my home folder, and it's a file I can mod as much as I want with text or gedit, with NPQQ I have to first move it to another folder, mod it there, and copy it back to where I need it. To much of a hassle for an app I hoped it would help me be more organized with it's colors. If this doesn't bother you, then the app is awesome.

This application failed to start because it could not find or load the Qt platform plugin "wayland-egl".

Available platform plugins are: eglfs, linuxfb, minimal, minimalegl, offscreen, xcb.

description: Muy práctica .
150 MO pour un éditeur sans aide et incapable d'incorporer de nouveaux langages (car sans aide et menu pour cela)
je me sans mieu ici par rapport au autres editeurs

Ce serait bien d'améliorer l'affichage des fichiers textes de types ISO-8859-1 
Actuellement, les caractères un peu spéciaux comme les apostrophes (par exempe) ne sont pas affichés.
La seule application sous Ubuntu que j'ai trouvé qui est capable d'afficher convenablement de tels fichiers est Firefox, même Writer (du pack LibreOffice) n'en est pas encore capable.
Ne vaut pas Notepad++ (porté sous Ubuntu) dont il s'inspire.
summary: La copie ne vaut pas l'original
